form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Motor Castingsings Company, 1322 50th Street Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53214

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 MOTOR CASTINGS COMPANY 1323 SOUTH 65th STREET MILWAUKEE WISCONSIN 53214 TELEPHONE (414) 476-1434 MANUFACTURERS OF ALLOY IRONS STATE minimum tensile strength MOCASO 30 30,000 psi MOCASO 35 35,000 psi MOCASO 40 40,000 psi MOCASO 50 50,000 psi MOCASO 60 60,000 psi 1913 1969 DUCTILE IRON FOUR GRADES August 15, 1969 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to verify that Perfecto Gonzales worked for our Company on the following dates: 10-28-55 to 12-27-57 Laid off 1-28-58 to 3-31-58 Laid off 10-14-58 to 11-11-58 Laid off 12-8-58 to 2-9-61 Laid off 3-6-61 to 4-6-61 Laid off 5-25-61 to 11-6-61 Laid off 11-20-61 to 4-7-67 Retired due to Health Sincerely, MOTOR CASTINGS COMPANY Busuel Sorensen Russell E. Sorensen Personnel Manager RES:jtk 50 YEARS DEDICATED TO QUALITY AND SERVICE 1919-1969
